title: You can now pre-order Apple’s new green iPhone 13 and alpine green iPhone 13 Pro
content:
With the Apple Online Store back, users can now pre-order the new green iPhone 13 and alpine green iPhone 13 Pro. They’re the latest color additions to Apple’s flagship phones introduced in September.

more…

The post You can now pre-order Apple’s new green iPhone 13 and alpine green iPhone 13 Pro appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Users can pre-order the new green iPhone 13 and alpine green iPhone 13 Pro. They're the latest color additions to Apple's flagship phones.
